com.chriswlucas.restaurant

Class JobManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.JobManager

  • public class JobManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles moving the jobs around the restaurant for a specific party.
    Author:
    Nick Anderson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobManager(PartyManager partyManager)
      Converts the ticket to a job and then moves it around.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void assignBussingJob(Job job)
      When the patrons have checked out the tables are added to the busser's queue of jobs to be cleaned.
      (package private) void assignCollectingJob()
      When customer wants to pay a collecting job is created.
      (package private) void assignProducingJob(Ticket tick)
      Creates a producing job for the bar or kitchen.
      (package private) void assignServingJob(Job job)
      Places the items on the waiters list of jobs to be served.
      PartyManager getPartyManager()
      Gets the containing party manager for the job manager

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobManager

        JobManager(PartyManager partyManager)
        Converts the ticket to a job and then moves it around.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • assignProducingJob

        void assignProducingJob(Ticket tick)
        Creates a producing job for the bar or kitchen.
        Parameters:
        tick - the ticket for the current order.

      • assignServingJob

        void assignServingJob(Job job)
        Places the items on the waiters list of jobs to be served.
        Parameters:
        items - list of items that have been produced by the bar or kitchen.

      • assignCollectingJob

        void assignCollectingJob()
        When customer wants to pay a collecting job is created. The tables that need to be collected are added to the waiters queue of jobs.

      • assignBussingJob

        void assignBussingJob(Job job)
        When the patrons have checked out the tables are added to the busser's queue of jobs to be cleaned. (Can be added to a waiter if the busser is busy.)
        Parameters:
        tables - list of tables that need to be cleaned.

      • getPartyManager

        public PartyManager getPartyManager()
        Gets the containing party manager for the job manager
        Returns:
        partyManager
